typeSystemDescription.name: TLMetadata
typeSystemDescription.description:
This type description file defines InputCasMetadata type, which records various metadata related to the Interaction and the input CAS. Note that one CAS should have only one metadata (only the first one should be considered, if more than one), and each CAS should have one metadata, even if all of its fields are null.
Note that language ID is not recorded in this metadata type. It is directly recorded in CAS. Also note that all of the metadata are simply strings, and can be null if that metadata is missing.
The type includes: (all strings) - interactionId - channel - provider - date (string as YYYY-MM-DD) - businessScenario - author

featureDescription.name: interactionId
featureDescription.description: interaction ID of the interaction, contained in the CAS.

featureDescription.name: channel
featureDescription.description: channel of the interaction (e.g. e-mail, web forum, speech, telephone transcript, etc)

featureDescription.name: provider
featureDescription.description: This value holds the provider as string (ALMA, OMQ or NICE, etc)

featureDescription.name: date
featureDescription.description: The date of the interaction: as ISO format of Year-Month-Day (YYYY-MM-DD)

featureDescription.name: businessScenario
featureDescription.description: This string holds the business scenario of the interaction (like coffeeshop, internet shopping, train claims, etc)

featureDescription.name: author
featureDescription.description: this field holds the name of the author, if it is applicable (e.g. web forums)
